trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> A Temple Knight at the station has bowls of piping hot soup to deliver, though they are in danger of becoming tepid before reaching the hungry.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_TODO_00<tab>Distribute the bowls of soup.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_TODO_01<tab>Return the uneaten soup to the Temple Knight.

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_000<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I say, is it your stomach which drew you here? For I am just setting about the business of dispensing meals.

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_001<tab>So much has transpired in so little time, 'tis hardly a wonder that so few citizens can sleep for more than a fistful of hours. And that is why I have taken it upon myself to feed these people with an Ishgardian soup, one that always helped calm my nerves when I was a child.

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_002<tab>Though it won't fix all that ails these poor souls, it may prove to be some comfort, surely. Here's the rub, though: I lack the hands needed to see it delivered in a timely manner... Might you assist me?
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_A1_000_001<tab>Of course.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_A1_000_002<tab>I'll pass.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_006<tab>O-Oh, of course. Silly of me to ask in the first place, I suppose. Should you change your mind, though, I will be here for a while yet.

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_003<tab>You will? You are a hero of the people indeed! Here are three bowls of piping hot soup. Could you see that those around the station who appear especially woebegone receive some?
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_005<tab>No doubt a few of the citizens you encounter will try to insist they can do without, but let's not take no for an answer!

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_MALLIUS_000_010<tab>What in the world is <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>? For pity's sake, get it away from me. You'll make me sick with that foreign trash you louts call food.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_Q2_000_100<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_A2_000_101<tab>It will warm you right up.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_A2_000_102<tab>It's a recipe from cold climes. It may be to your liking.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_MALLIUS_000_011<tab>Oh enough. What are you, some two-gil salesman? I'll take the damnable thing if it'll shut you up.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_MALLIUS_000_012<tab>Oh. Oh my, that is nice, isn't it? And so warm...

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_MALLIUS_000_013<tab>The hells are you looking at, then? I got my food, now off with you. What, afraid I'll run off with the bowl, are you? I'm not <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> hard up as to resort to stealing. I can get it back to the cook just fine on my own.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_MALLIUS_100_013<tab>I told you I'd get the bowl back to you later, didn't I? Just want to make sure I don't leave even a drop behind... This is good stuff.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_POPPAEA_000_014<tab>What is this? Soup, you say? That's very kind of you.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_POPPAEA_000_015<tab>It's been far too long since I had a hot meal. Can't rightly remember the last time.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_POPPAEA_000_016<tab>Let me guess, this is an Ishgardian recipe, isn't it? My mother used to make something similar, once upon a time. It was a red soup well known in these parts.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_POPPAEA_000_017<tab>Thank you for bringing me this reminder of happier days─days I hope to see returned to our country.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_POPPAEA_100_017<tab>I would love to have more of this again. Only if there's enough to go around, that is.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_CITIZENC04231_000_018<tab>So first you march into our homeland, easy as you please, and now you tell us what foods we're to eat? Oh, that's very rich. Very rich, indeed!

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_CITIZENC04231_000_019<tab>But let me tell you something, you little weasel. I spit on your charity, you hear? Spit on it. So you can take that soup of yours and stuff it where the sun don't shine!
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_MALLIUS_200_013<tab>Hm, maybe I'll grab some more when I bring the bowl back. Huh? No, I wasn't talkin' to you. Shoo!
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_POPPAEA_200_017<tab>Someone's providing soup to the hungry, are they? How very charitable. Perhaps they would like some help.
TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_020<tab>Ah, there you are. So, how did you fare? Did you manage to deliver the soup like I asked?

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_021<tab>Oh, turned away by one surly citizen, were you? That's unfortunate, although not entirely surprising. The people here have been through more than most.

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_022<tab>I'm not a stranger entire to their pain. When Ishgard was in dire straits, I too found myself fatigued beyond measure, my spirits in the doldrums. I was hanging on by a quickly unraveling thread, it felt, and hope was nothing more than a risible dream.

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_023<tab>But it was at the Holy Stables when a woman─one I had never before met─offered me a simple bowl of soup. I was in such a dark, foul mood at the time, but...one sip was enough to turn my whole world around. I felt alive again, like I had purpose once more.

TEXT_AKTKZD007_04231_ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231_000_024<tab>I thought to emulate that charity, do for these people what that kindly lady did for me. But you know what they say: even the best laid plans and all that. Well, I won't let one fractious local dampen my spirits. I'm only sorry you had to deal with them!
